title: Make ahead turkey gravy
ingredients: ['1.3kg turkey wings', '2 small onions, quartered', '2 sticks celery, each cut into 4 pieces', '2 carrots, each cut into 4 pieces', '2 cloves garlic, halved', '355ml dry white wine', '950ml chicken stock', '950ml water', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons butter, or more if needed (optional', '60g plain flour', 'salt and ground black pepper, to taste']
